name: Scaffold
description:
An abstract puzzle game / geometric system concept.

Controls: Mouse only, no clicking required.

Instructions as in game:

  • Hover the mouse cursor over a corner of a block to create a new block.
  • Move the mouse cursor to rotate and place the new block. 
  • Placing a block on top of an existing block will destroy both blocks. 
  • Blocks alternate in color, and the edges of newer blocks will be visible over older ones. 
  • Place a block on one of the numerals above to select a challenge or F for free play. 

Additional instructions & notes:

  • Hover the cursor over red text to activate it.
  • Moving the cursor too far from a new block without placing it will destroy it.
  • The way a new block rotates depends on the direction you initially pull it in. It's can be  bit tricky; go slow and experiment!
  • Sometimes you may need to create and place more than one new block at a time.
  • There are no checks implemented for the challenges. If your pattern visually matches the example, then you did it!
